sentences.en: At least seventy students were injured in the continuing agitation against the decision.
sentences.cn: 至少有70名学生在反对该决定的持续抗争中受伤。

sentences.en: He is over seventy but he shows no signs of slowing up.
He is over seventy but still going strong.
sentences.cn: 他70多了,身子骨还挺硬朗.

sentences.en: I was driving up at seventy miles an hour on the inside lane on the motorway.
sentences.cn: 我在高速公路的慢道上以每小时70英里的速度行驶。

sentences.en: It'll cost them the princely sum of seventy-five pounds.
sentences.cn: 这将花费他们75英镑巨款。

sentences.en: My teacher is a seventy - year - old woman.
sentences.cn: 我的老师是一位70 岁 的老妇人.

sentences.en: My weight went down to seventy pounds.
Seventy thousand people will pack the stadium.
sentences.cn: 将有7万人挤满整个体育场。

sentences.en: She was within sight of Navratilova'srecord of seventy-four consecutive wins.
sentences.cn: 她已经逼近了纳夫拉蒂洛娃74连胜的纪录。

sentences.en: She worked up her typing speed to seventy words a minute.
sentences.cn: 她把打字速度提高到每分钟70个字.

sentences.en: The country has been battered by winds of between fifty and seventy miles an hour.
sentences.cn: 该国遭受到时速高达50至70英里的大风袭击，破坏严重。

sentences.en: The figure of seventy-million pounds was twice as big as expected.
sentences.cn: 7,000万英镑的金额是预期的两倍。

sentences.en: The game followed a colourful opening ceremony before a crowd of seventy-four thousand.
sentences.cn: 绚丽多彩的开幕式过后，这场比赛在74,000名观众的瞩目之下开始了。

sentences.en: This hall holds a maximum of seventy people.
sentences.cn: 这厅最多能容纳七十人.

sentences.en: We lost touch during the seventies.
sentences.cn: 我们在70年代失去了联系。

words.tran_cn: 第七十的；七十分之一的
七十；七十个；七十岁；七十年代

trans.tran_cn: 七十的；七十个的；七十岁的
七十，从七十到七十九的数目、年数或温度
